Happened upon this gem in 2004 in romania's internet cafes.  It was love since then.  Unfortunately in 2008 someone hacked and stole my account because of some trend where people wanted low ID accounts like it made them special.  I contacted steam and they were unable to help me even tho it was my account and I had all the information.  Disappointing to say the least.  So my valued 9k and change hours playing this game arent exactly accurate lol.  Add an additional 3-4k hours.  That is the depth of my dedication to this game.  It is unrivaled in my opinion.  I have played all sorts of other games since but this is my mainstay!  Recommend wholeheartedly.  :)
